mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_boards (seq, "content", title, rgstr_date, updt_date, user_id) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE(max(seq),0)+1 AS seq FROM tb_boards), #{content}, #{title}, now(), now(), #{user_id} )
mapper.select: select * from tb_boards order by rgstr_date desc
mapper.update: update tb_boards set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updt_date = now() where seq = #{seq}
